ygData.subject: Re: AW: [Bristlebane_EQ] possible weekly trade festival...
ygData.msgSnippet: Agedon, Don t you have a version of invisibility yet, or do necromancers not get it to 16th? Would love to get it at 16th, I have to wait for 30th... :( On
ygData.messageBody:
Agedon,

Don't you have a version of invisibility yet, or do necromancers not
get it to 16th? Would love to get it at 16th, I have to wait for
30th... :(

On another note, does anyone have a bbc or sale or are they willing to
assist me in getting one? Level 19 shadow knight here, always up for a
hunt.

Khalabbil

--- "Proplesch, Carsten" <GER7CBP@...> wrote:
> From: "Proplesch, Carsten" <GER7CBP@...>
>
> i think that ur idea isnt that bad...but i got a
> question....how could i get
> there??
> the prob is that i am a gnomish necromancer...and
> not very liked in freeport
> to be seen...so how shall i join that event??
>
> greetings
>
> agedon, lvl 15 necromaner of akkon
>
> -----Ursprï¿½ngliche Nachricht-----
> Von: Mark Heine [mailto:m_heine@...]
> Gesendet am: Sonntag, 6. Juni 1999 21:40
> An: Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com
> Betreff: [Bristlebane_EQ] possible weekly trade
> festival...
>
> From: Mark Heine <m_heine@...>
>
> i would like to suggest a weekly trade festival at
> the swanky swashbuckler's
>
> cave. (it is located in east commons, with an
> entrance to it also from north
>
> ro) i think that this would be a great place for
> players to bring thier rare
>
> or hand made items and try and sell or trade them.
> looking to sell that
> rare polished tomahawk, or that hand made high
> quality bow? looking to find
> a smith selling banded armor, or trying to find that
> peice of bronze plate
> that you are missing? just found some rubicite armor
> and want to fetch a top
>
> price for it? i think that this game is already
> awesome, but we can make it
> better with weekly events like this, or other
> events. i suggest it be held
> every saturday at 3PM EST. this should be a time
> when most players can get
> on.
>
> other possibilities for this weelky trade festival
> can be a place for guilds
>
> to try and recruit other players. players can get
> together and discuss
> quests or what certain lore items are for (for
> example i have a pirates
> earing, a lore item, and have no idea what is it
> for). maybe rich guilds
> and/or rich players can even hold some contests with
> prizes.
>
> if this sounds like a good idea, please reply to the
> list with your comments
>
> and/or let players know about it in the game. verant
> has given us a grand
> start, but it is up to us to make it even better!!
>
>
